body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Carl Jackson and the customer's name is Hannah Hughes.  The conversation is about Strolid Motors (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting ABC Solutions. My name is Sarah. Could I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Sarah, my name is John Doe.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, John. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having some trouble with my account login.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I can help with that. Can you please provide me with your email address associated with the account?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, John. Could you also give me your phone number to verify your identity?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, I've noted that down. Please hold on for a moment while I check your information.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, John. I've reset your account. You should now be able to login. Is there anything else I can help you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thanks for your help, Sarah.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, John. Thank you for contacting ABC Solutions. Have a great day!
